title: Цифровая броня
overview: In four years, there has been a more than fivefold increase in crimes in the digital environment. Thus, at the moment cybercrime is one of the fastest growing categories of crimes in Russia. Thanks to the assistance of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Russia at all stages of production, the project will use declassified unique film footage from the archive of the most high-profile cybercrimes of recent years, which other bloggers do not and cannot have. Interviews with employees of investigative bodies, specialists of the Center for countering extremism who conducted these cases, as well as filming of defendants in correctional institutions.
